name: Grizzly Fate
originalText:
Put two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Threshold — Put four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens onto the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: At the time this spell is resolving, it is on the stack and not in the graveyard. This means that you should not count this card when determining whether the Threshold effect occurs.

text:
